QuestData.Title: Ammo Kerblammo
QuestData.Description: Hartley must've unloaded all of his ordnance along the beach. Let's pull his teeth out, $n!$B$BRun along the shore and look for his munitions stockpiles. Light 'em up and he'll be land-locked and unarmed while the Bellipotent is repaired.$B$BI'll meet you back here in Ratchet.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Gazlowe's voice crackles through the stolen gnomecorder...
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy 5 Theramore Ammunition Stockpiles along the coast.
QuestData.CompletionText: So... how fares Vice Admiral Hartley? Miserable, I hope?
QuestData.RewardText: Hah! Beautiful work, $n. Those Alliance cretins will never trace this back to me. Meanwhile, it's back to business as usual: smuggling, double-dealing, price-gouging... I've got a lot of work to catch up on.$B$BHere, I'll let you in on a cut of my future profits. Enjoy!
